mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_video(course_id, chapter_id, title, video_source_id, video_original_name, sort, duration, status, size, version, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUE (#{courseId},#{chapterId},#{title},#{videoSourceId},#{videoOriginalName},#{sort},#{duration},#{status},#{size},#{version},#{gmtCreated},#{gmtModified})
